document.full_text: shares of bailed-out insurer american international group  fell to their lowest levels in nearly eight months on monday, potentially moving them into loss-making territory for the u.s. treasury.
document.title: aig shares hit fresh lows, threaten u.s. losses
lines_and_colors: shares of bailed-out insurer american international group  fell to their lowest levels in nearly eight months on monday, potentially moving them into loss-making territory for the u.s. treasury.
